name.text:
Child<2 months, no shots, #1 forecasted at 2 months of age
Evaluation_Test_Type: No Doses Administered
General_Description: This test case describes when a child is less than two months of age and has not received any doses of the Hib vaccine that the first dose should be forecast at 2 months of age.

recommendation.description:
Evaluation_Test_Type: No Doses Administered
Forecast_Test_Type: EvaluationRecommended based on age
General_Description: This test case describes when a child is less than two months of age and has not received any doses of the Hib vaccine that the first dose should be forecast at 2 months of age.
